title: Why do we get lame/boring topics on OCE homepage?
body: Every time I watch a stream from any other country like Qtpie in NA or Rekkless in Eu, I see they have awesome things to read on their homepage. Actual interesting topics but our OCE homepage has boring shit like "Where are you watching it?" or "Chiefs Vs Avant" or "Legacy Esports." Please give us some shit that we care about. No one cares about oce. Stop trying to entice us. Let us join the rest of the world of players. Yeah it might be good to read for some people but seriously we never get what NA gets. Why?{{item:3151}}

replies.body:
The OCE homepage has those because the semifinals of the OPL starts tonight. Appreciate the feedback that you aren't interested in the Oceanic esports scene, but other players are. 

If you want content about NA teams I recommend checking out lolesports.com

Thank you Sephyre. People do care about Oce LCS but it's just getting annoying because we can watch lcs if we want- I'd at least make it more of a sub-topic rather than give it all of the space on the homepage.

I'm sick of opening the client seeing a bunch of overweight Asians on my screen. At least EUW gets burgerson, what do we get? We get garbage ass players, with garbage ass bodies. I mean honestly Riot, I don't want to look at that shit.

the percentage of bronze players in oce compared to every other rank is the highest in the entire world, which means we're either the worst, the biggest trolls or both, so you could very much argue that oce lcs is undoubtedly worse than every single other leagues in comparison

OCE used to get a fairy interesting homepage though, if you just wanna use forums for chit chatting purposes.

Tbh I kinda miss the days of the constant flames and arguments back then, a little.

>  Yeah it might be good to read for some people but seriously we never get what NA gets. Why?{{item:3151}}

Bwahaha NA are garbage as fuck anyway, EU/Korea masterrace
